<The Picture of Dorian Gray
1:
--------------------
Text: The Picture of Dorian Gray (1945 film):  Released in March 1945 by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, the film is directed by Albert Lewin and stars George Sanders as Lord Henry Wotton and Hurd Hatfield as Dorian Gray.
Triplets:<The Picture of Dorian Gray
2:
--------------------
Text: The Picture of Dorian Gray (1945 film):  Shot primarily in black-and-white, the film features four inserts in 3-strip Technicolor of Dorian's portrait as a special effect (the first two of his portrait's original state, and the second two after a major period of degeneration).
